channel.title: Psalms on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Psalms on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive

item.title: Psalms - American Standard-ASV1901 (ASV)
item.description: [1:1] Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the wicked, Nor standeth in the way of sinners, Nor sitteth in the seat of scoffers: [1:2] But his delight is in the law of Jehovah; And on his law doth he meditate day and night. [1:3] And he shall be like a tree planted by the streams of water, That bringeth forth its fruit in its season, Whose leaf also doth not wither; And whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.

item.title: Psalms - Bible in Basic English (BBE)
item.description: [1:1] Happy is the man who does not go in the company of sinners, or take his place in the way of evil-doers, or in the seat of those who do not give honour to the Lord. [1:2] But whose delight is in the law of the Lord, and whose mind is on his law day and night. [1:3] He will be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, which gives its fruit at the right time, whose leaves will ever be green; and he will do well in all his undertakings.

item.title: Psalms - King James Version (KJV)
item.description: [1:1] Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful. [1:2] But his delight is in the law of the LORD; and in his law doth he meditate day and night. [1:3] And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.

item.title: Psalms - World English Bible (WEB)
Psalms - Young's Literal Translation (YLT)
